entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle or snow changing to 30 percent chance of snow near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 6:53 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of snow. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:53 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
